title: Part A(i)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include a claim (explicit or implied) that the sphere can have a centripetal force without any individual force pointing toward the center of its circular path.
The response accurately includes a claim (explicit or implied) that the sphere can have a centripetal force without any individual force pointing toward the center of its circular path.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:

The maxima should be equal in energy but may have any energy value.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note: If the incorrect selection is made, the response is not graded.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include a correct selection AND correct reasoning in terms of the changing direction of the sphere’s rotation.
The response accurately includes a correct selection AND correct reasoning in terms of the changing direction of the sphere’s rotation.
